item.title: Speaking at the Utah Open Source Conference 2012
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: The Utah Open Source Conference is back for 2012. This year it is May 3 – 5 at Utah Valley University. My session, Improving Front End Web Performance, is on Friday May 4th at 11:15am in room 501. If you’ll be at the conference be sure to stop by and say hi.
item.content:encoded:
The Utah Open Source Conference is back for 2012. This year it is May 3 – 5 at Utah Valley University.

My session, Improving Front End Web Performance, is on Friday May 4th at 11:15am in room 501. If you’ll be at the conference be sure to stop by and say hi.

item.title: Utah Open Source Conference Presentation: Anatomy of a PHP Request
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: The Utah Open Source Conference is coming up at the end of this week (October 7-9). I’ll be giving an updated version of my Anatomy of a PHP Request presentation on the opening day, this Thursday. The last paragraph sums it up nicely: By the end of this presentation you’ll be familiar with the series […]
item.content:encoded:
The Utah Open Source Conference is coming up at the end of this week (October 7-9). I’ll be giving an updated version of my Anatomy of a PHP Request presentation on the opening day, this Thursday. The last paragraph sums it up nicely:

By the end of this presentation you’ll be familiar with the series of events involved with every PHP request and the tools to measure and improve the performance of your scripts.

If you are going to be at the conference be sure to drop by and say hi.

item.title: Utah Open Source Conference 2009
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: The 2009 Utah Open Source Conference is coming up next week. I’ll be doing a presentation on using nginx and php-fpm to power your WordPress site.
item.content:encoded: The 2009 Utah Open Source Conference is coming up next week. I’ll be doing a presentation on using nginx and php-fpm to power your WordPress site.

item.title: Speaking at UTOSC 2008
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I’ll be speaking at the 2008 Utah Open Source Conference on WordPress Performance and Scalability. UTOSC is at the Salt Lake Community College this year, August 28-30.
item.content:encoded: I’ll be speaking at the 2008 Utah Open Source Conference on WordPress Performance and Scalability. UTOSC is at the Salt Lake Community College this year, August 28-30.
